uvi.product_version: versions from v5.14.4 to before v5.14.16
uvi.description:
ice: check whether PTP is initialized in ice_ptp_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.16 by commit 63a97a9f95f26fb64c72087bfbdce767f69929e6, it was introduced in version v5.14.4 by commit 46720ac66c21bf85e08823664b7b314b85e43f26. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ice: check whether PTP is initialized in ice_ptp_release()
